thag1.10:1.1: A knowledge master, peaceful and self-controlled,
thag1.10:1.2: is rid of concern for this world and the world beyond.
thag1.10:1.3: Unsullied in the midst of all things,
thag1.10:1.4: they’d know the arising and passing of the world.
thag1.10:1.5: It was thus that this verse was recited by the senior venerable Puṇṇamāsa.
